com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util

クラス ExtensionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.ExtensionUtils

  • public class ExtensionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The extension utils class contains utility functions used by several extensions.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • drawText

        public static void drawText(Canvas canvas,
            java.lang.String text,
            float x,
            float y,
            TextPaint textPaint,
            int availableWidth)
        Draw text on canvas. Shade if text too long to fit.
        パラメータ:
        canvas - The canvas to draw in.
        text - The text to draw.
        x - The x coordinate.
        y - The y coordinate.
        textPaint - The paint to draw with.
        availableWidth - The available width for the text

      • getUriString

        public static java.lang.String getUriString(Context context,
                            int resourceId)
        Get URI string from resourceId.
        パラメータ:
        context - The context.
        resourceId - The resource id.
        戻り値:
        The URI string.

      • areAnyAccessoriesConnected

        public static boolean areAnyAccessoriesConnected(Context context)
        Check in the database if there are any accessories connected.
        パラメータ:
        context - The context
        戻り値:
        True if at least one accessories is connected.

      • getContactName

        public static java.lang.String getContactName(Context context,
                              Uri contactUri)
        Get the contact name from a URI.
        パラメータ:
        context - The context.
        contactUri - The contact URI.
        戻り値:
        The contact name.

      • getContactPhoto

        public static Bitmap getContactPhoto(Context context,
                     Uri contactUri)
        Get the contact photo from a contact URI.
        パラメータ:
        context - The context.
        contactUri - The contact URI.
        戻り値:
        The contact photo.

      • getBitmapFromUri

        public static Bitmap getBitmapFromUri(Context context,
                      java.lang.String uriString)
        Get bitmap from a URI.
        パラメータ:
        context - The context.
        uriString - The URI as a string.
        戻り値:
        The bitmap.

      • getExtensionId

        public static long getExtensionId(Context context)
        Get id of a registered extension
        戻り値:
        Id, INVALID_ID if extension is not registered

      • supportsHistory

        public static boolean supportsHistory(Intent intent)
        Get the value of the intent extra parameter Registration.Intents#EXTRA_ACCESSORY_SUPPORTS_HISTORY from the intent that started the configuration activity.
        パラメータ:
        intent - The intent that started the configuration activity, see Registration.ExtensionColumns#CONFIGURATION_ACTIVITY
        戻り値:
        Value of Registration.Intents#EXTRA_ACCESSORY_SUPPORTS_HISTORY, true if not contained in the intent extras.

      • supportsActions

        public static boolean supportsActions(Intent intent)
        Get the value of the intent extra parameter Registration.Intents#EXTRA_ACCESSORY_SUPPORTS_ACTIONS from the intent that started the configuration activity.
        パラメータ:
        intent - The intent that started the configuration activity, see Registration.ExtensionColumns#CONFIGURATION_ACTIVITY
        戻り値:
        Value of Registration.Intents#EXTRA_ACCESSORY_SUPPORTS_ACTIONS, true if not contained in the intent extras.

      • getFormattedTime

        public static java.lang.String getFormattedTime(long publishedTime)
        Get formatted time.
        パラメータ:
        publishedTime - The published time in millis.
        戻り値:
        The formatted time.
